remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类是具有 O （log n）检索的二进制搜索树，其中 n 是字典中的元素数。The generic class is a binary search tree with O(log n) retrieval, where n is the number of elements in the dictionary. 在这方面，它类似于 的泛型类。In this respect, it is similar to the generic class. 这两个类具有相似的对象模型，两者都有 O （log n）检索。The two classes have similar object models, and both have O(log n) retrieval. 这两个类的不同之处在于内存使用和插入和删除的速度：Where the two classes differ is in memory use and speed of insertion and removal: - 比 使用的内存更少。 uses less memory than . - 对于未排序的数据， 具有更快的插入和删除操作： O （log n），而不是 的 O （n）。 has faster insertion and removal operations for unsorted data: O(log n) as opposed to O(n) for . - 如果列表是从已排序数据一次填充的，则 比 快。If the list is populated all at once from sorted data, is faster than . 每个键/值对都可以作为 结构检索，或者作为通过非泛型 接口的 来检索。Each key/value pair can be retrieved as a structure, or as a through the nongeneric interface. 密钥必须是不可变的，只要它们用作 中的密钥。Keys must be immutable as long as they are used as keys in the . 中的每个键都必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 如果值类型 `TValue` 为引用类型，则不能 `null`项，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if the value type `TValue` is a reference type. 要求使用比较器实现来执行键比较。 requires a comparer implementation to perform key comparisons. 您可以使用接受 `comparer` 参数的构造函数指定 泛型接口的实现;如果未指定实现，则使用默认的 languageprimitives.genericcomparer 。You can specify an implementation of the generic interface by using a constructor that accepts a `comparer` parameter; if you do not specify an implementation, the default genericcomparer is used. 如果类型 `TKey` 实现 泛型接口，则默认比较器使用该实现。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default comparer uses that implementation. C#语言的 `foreach` 语句（`for each` 中C++`For Each` Visual Basic）返回集合中元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 由于 的每个元素都是一个键/值对，因此元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 而是 元素类型。Instead, the element type is . 下面的代码演示C#了C++、和 Visual Basic 语法。The following code shows C#, C++, and Visual Basic syntax. [!code-cpp[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/cpp/source2.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/CS/source2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/VB/source2.vb#11)] `foreach` 语句是枚举器周围的包装器，它只允许从集合读取，而不允许写入。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which allows only reading from the collection, not writing to it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用字符串键创建一个空的字符串 ，并使用 方法添加一些元素。The following code example creates an empty of strings with string keys and uses the method to add some elements. 该示例演示了在尝试添加重复键时 方法引发了 。The example demonstrates that the method throws an when attempting to add a duplicate key. 该示例使用 属性（中C#的索引器）来检索值，演示在请求的键不存在时引发 ，并显示与键关联的值可以替换。The example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 该示例演示如何使用方法作为更高效的方法来检索值，如果程序必须经常尝试在字典中，不并显示如何使用方法来测试某个键是否存在之前调用方法。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary, and it shows how to use the method to test whether a key exists before calling the method. 该示例演示如何枚举字典中的键和值，以及如何使用 属性和 属性单独枚举键和值。The example shows how to enumerate the keys and values in the dictionary and how to enumerate the keys and values alone using the property and the property. 最后，该示例演示 方法。Finally, the example demonstrates the method. [!code-csharp[Generic.SortedDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.SortedDictionary/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.SortedDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.SortedDictionary/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于枚举目的，每个项都是一个表示值及其键的 结构。For purposes of enumeration, each item is a structure representing a value and its key. C#语言的 `foreach` 语句（`for each` 中C++`For Each` Visual Basic）隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 使用内部树按排序顺序维护字典。The dictionary is maintained in a sorted order using an internal tree. 每个新元素都置于正确的排序位置，并且在每次删除元素时，都会调整树来维护排序顺序。Every new element is positioned at the correct sort position, and the tree is adjusted to maintain the sort order whenever an element is removed. 在枚举时，将保留排序顺序。While enumerating, the sort order is maintained. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置， 属性是不确定的。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 方法将枚举器推进到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 属性返回相同的元素，直到调用 方法。The property returns the same element until the method is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位到集合中的最后一个元素之后， 返回 `false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则 未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对 或 的下一次调用引发了 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法的运算复杂度为 O （log n），其中 n 为 count。This method is an O(log n) operation, where n is count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了使用以下C#语法访问集合中的特定元素的功能： `myCollection[key]` （`myCollection(key)` 在 Visual Basic 中）。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置 中不存在的键的值;例如，`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果 中已经存在指定的键，则设置 属性将覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 如果值类型 `TValue` 为引用类型，则不能 `null`项，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if the value type `TValue` is a reference type. 该C#语言使用[this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this)关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 获取此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O （log `n`）;设置属性也是 O （log `n`）操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(log `n`) operation; setting the property is also an O(log `n`) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性（中C#的索引器）来检索值，演示在请求的项不存在时引发 ，并显示与键关联的值可以替换。The following code example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 该示例还演示了如何使用 方法作为一种更有效的方法来检索值（如果程序通常必须尝试不在字典中的键值）。The example also shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这可能会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which can cause the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 属性返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 的访问。The property returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 仅当所有线程在访问集合之前锁定对象时，同步才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock the object before accessing the collection. 获取此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O （1）。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于枚举目的，每个项都是 结构。For purposes of enumeration, each item is a structure. C#语言的 `foreach` 语句（`for each` 中C++`For Each` Visual Basic）隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法还将枚举器恢复到此位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 方法将枚举器推进到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 属性返回相同的对象，直到调用 或 。The property returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位到集合中的最后一个元素之后， 返回 `false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则 未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对 或 的下一次调用引发了 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法是一个 O （log n）操作，其中 n 是集合中的多个元素。This method is an O(log n) operation where n is a number of elements in a collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `foreach` 语句（`For Each` Visual Basic 中 `for each` 中C++的）枚举字典中的键/值对，该语句隐藏了枚举器的使用。The following code example shows how to enumerate the key/value pairs in the dictionary by using the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++), which hides the use of the enumerator. 特别要注意的是， 接口的枚举器将返回 对象，而不是 对象。In particular, note that the enumerator for the interface returns objects rather than objects. 此代码示例是为 方法提供的更大示例的一部分，包括输出。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止添加和移除元素的包装;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，包括添加或删除元素，则固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 获取此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O （1）。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 获取此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O （1）。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了使用以下C#语法访问集合中的特定元素的功能： `myCollection[key]` （`myCollection(key)` 在 Visual Basic 中）。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置字典中不存在的键的值;例如，`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果字典中已存在指定的键，则设置 属性会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 该C#语言使用[this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this)关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 获取此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O （log `n`）;设置属性也是 O （log `n`）操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(log `n`) operation; setting the property is also an O(log `n`) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有 的 接口的 属性C#（中的索引器），以及该属性与 属性不同的方式。The following code example shows how to use the property (the indexer in C#) of the interface with a , and ways the property differs from the property. 该示例显示，与 属性一样， 属性可更改与现有键关联的值，如果指定键不在字典中，则可用于添加新的键/值对。The example shows that, like the property, the property can change the value associated with an existing key and can be used to add a new key/value pair if the specified key is not in the dictionary. 该示例还演示了与 属性不同的是，如果 `key` 不在字典中，则 属性不会引发异常，而是返回空引用。The example also shows that unlike the property, the property does not throw an exception if `key` is not in the dictionary, returning a null reference instead. 最后，该示例演示如果 `key` 不是正确的数据类型，则获取 属性返回空引用; 如果 `key` 不是正确的数据类型，则设置属性将引发异常。Finally, the example demonstrates that getting the property returns a null reference if `key` is not the correct data type, and that setting the property throws an exception if `key` is not the correct data type. 此代码示例是为 方法提供的更大示例的一部分，包括输出。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. summary.span: 返回循环访问集合的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

returns.span: 一个可用于遍历集合的。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C#语言的 `foreach` 语句（`For Each` Visual Basic 中C++的`for each`）隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置， 属性是不确定的。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 方法将枚举器推进到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 属性返回相同的元素，直到调用 方法。The property returns the same element until the method is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位到集合中的最后一个元素之后， 返回 `false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则 未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对 或 的下一次调用引发了 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法是一个 O （log n）操作，其中 n 是集合中的多个元素。This method is an O(log n) operation where n is a number of elements in a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将 方法和 属性的功能组合在一起。This method combines the functionality of the method and the property. 如果未找到该键，则 `value` 参数将获取值类型 `TValue`的适当默认值;例如，对于整数类型，为0（零），为布尔值类型 `false`，对于引用类型为 `null`。If the key is not found, then the `value` parameter gets the appropriate default value for the value type `TValue`; for example, 0 (zero) for integer types, `false` for Boolean types, and `null` for reference types. 此方法是 O （log `n`）操作。This method is an O(log `n`) operation. ## Examples 该示例演示了如何使用 方法，以更有效的方式在经常尝试不在字典中的键的程序中检索值。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values in a program that frequently tries keys that are not in the dictionary. 相反，此示例还演示了在尝试检索不存在的键时C#， 属性（中的索引器）如何引发异常。For contrast, the example also shows how the property (the indexer in C#) throws exceptions when attempting to retrieve nonexistent keys. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
